cells.data: -- quickSortBy :: (a -> a -> Ordering) -> [a] -> [a]on quickSortBy(cmp, xs)	if length of xs > 1 then		set h to item 1 of xs		script			on |λ|(x)				cmp's |λ|(x, h) ≠ 1			end |λ|		end script		set {less, more} to partition(result, rest of xs)		quickSortBy(cmp, less) & h & quickSortBy(cmp, more)	else		xs	end ifend quickSortBy
